mapper.insert: MERGE INTO search USING dual ON (s_keyword = #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET s_count = s_count + 1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (search_id, s_keyword, s_count, create_date, modified_date) VALUES (search_id_seq.nextval, #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, sysdate, sysdate)
